page.title: 14WAY OF LIFE(2) SAINTFIELD
page.content: Nine families have no cars,but some own landrovers,vans or motorbikes.37 families(46%) have one car,and surprisingly 34(42%) own two or more cars.Other vehicles owned by 19 families include dumper trucks,trailers and diggers(used in their work)and tractor owners made up 13% of our 80 families. Sixty one(76%) of our survey families owned their own home, and the rest were rented, mostly from the N.I. Housing Executive. Of the total families,46(58%) fathers travelled out of Saintfield to work,some more than ten miles,which shows an increasing tendency to use Saintfield as a dormitory town.
